Package org.group8.view

Class Visualization

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
org.group8.view.Visualization
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, IVisualization
public class Visualization extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas implements IVisualization
The Visualization class provides the graphical representation of patients in the simulation using a canvas. It handles displaying new patients, removing them, and resetting the display.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Visualization

      public Visualization(int w, int h)
      Constructs a new Visualization with specified width and height. Initializes the canvas and clears the display.
      Parameters:
      w - the width of the canvas
      h - the height of the canvas

  • Method Details

    • clearDisplay

      public void clearDisplay()
      Clears the display by filling the background with a light blue color and resetting the patient position coordinates.
      Specified by:
      clearDisplay in interface IVisualization

    • newPatient

      public void newPatient(String state)
      Displays a new patient on the canvas at the current position based on the provided state. Moves the drawing position for the next patient. If the canvas bounds are reached, the display is cleared and reset. The patient state determines the image to be drawn. The default image is drawn if the state is not recognized.
      Specified by:
      newPatient in interface IVisualization
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the patient (e.g., "treatment", "sick", "xray", etc.)

    • removePatient

      public void removePatient()
      Removes the last drawn patient from the canvas. Adjusts the position to reflect the removal and ensures the canvas background is redrawn.
      Specified by:
      removePatient in interface IVisualization
